metadata.name: The Blond Woman - Loneliness
metadata.description:
Who is she? 
This blond woman standing in front of me. 

Her hair blowing in the wind, 
She radiates in my dream. 

Her scent floats in the air we share. 
I feel lucky to stand in her world somewhere. 

I fuel my fantasy, 
Creating a universe where we are happy. 

She doesn't know me, but I know her from the start. 
At least the version I draw in my dead heart. 

I recreate each of our encounters, endlessly satisfied. 

But who are you, my beautiful unknown blonde? 

You travel through time, fighting against the destiny attributed to you by men. 

You are not one who follows other people's dreams, 
It is along your road that souls are lost in the gleams. 

Let me have a little space in your lonely boat. 
I'll try not to succumb to my heady road. 

You take with you the best there is, 
And for the rest, the choice remains his.

-VanLyxe

** First piece of the Blond Woman Collection **
